parameters.name: SymId
parameters.description: Name of the geometric tolerance symbol formatted as: < LibraryName-SymbolName > where LibraryName and SymbolName are in the SOLIDWORKS text file C:\ProgramData\SolidWorks\SolidWorks 20 nn \ lang \ english\gtol.sym . NOTE : You must include the right- and left-angle brackets and separate LibraryName and SymbolName with a hyphen; for example, <MOD-DEG>.

parameters.name: Retval
parameters.description: True if the geometric tolerance symbol is bound, false if not

title: IEnvironment.GetIsBound
description: Gets whether the specified geometric tolerance symbol is bound.
signature:
void GetIsBound( 
   System.String
SymId
,
   out System.Boolean
Retval
)

parameters.name: SymId
parameters.description: Name of the geometric tolerance symbol formatted as: < LibraryName-SymbolName > where LibraryName and SymbolName are in the SOLIDWORKS text file C:\ProgramData\SolidWorks\SolidWorks 20 nn \ lang \ english\gtol.sym . NOTE : You must include the right- and left-angle brackets and separate LibraryName and SymbolName with a hyphen; for example, <MOD-DEG>.

parameters.name: Retval
parameters.description: True if the geometric tolerance symbol is bound, false if not

remarks: Bound controls the horizontal spacing of a geometric tolerance symbol within a row of text in notes and dimensions.
